channel.title: CVE Feed for Martin Gibson -- WP GoToWebinar

item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Martin Gibson WP GoToWebinar plugin <=Â 14.45 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-38776|2024-08-02T17:37:34.998Z -- martin%20gibson -- wp%20gotowebinar
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Martin Gibson WP GoToWebinar allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects WP GoToWebinar: from n/a through 15.7.
